sentence.Network_en: Too much spending on rearmament would place an insupportable burden on the nation'sproductive capacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 过于庞大的重整军备开支会给国家的生产力带来难以承受的负担。

sentence.Network_en: He opposed the rearmament of Japan after world war ii.
sentence.Network_cn: 他反对二战后日本重整军备.

sentence.Network_en: The so called Triple Intervention caused the Japanese army and navy to intensify their rearmament.
sentence.Network_cn: 所谓的三方干涉使得日本不断增强其在军队和海军的实力.

entry.def: Rearmament is the process of building up a new stock of military weapons.

sentences.sentence: "he opposed the rearmament of Japan after World War II"

auth_sentence.content: The chief aim of the speech was to promote rearmament, without regard for international restrictions.
